title: Short-Intensive Training to Strengthen Digital Design Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic design principles and software usage (intermediate level)
context.additional_context: Completion of practical projects and feedback-driven learning experiences in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete practical design projects (portfolio/advertising materials) by utilizing core features of major design software.
Learners can identify the nine major learning barriers encountered in the digital design process and apply resolution strategies.
Learners can share design prototypes with team members and exchange feedback using smartphone-based collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
